<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.18

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns data about squad of given unit loaded from squad.xml.<br>
All items in returned array are [[String]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''squadParams''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>squadNick,squadName,squadEmail,squadWeb,squadPicture,squadTitle],[memberId,memberNick,memberName,memberEmail,memberIcq,memberRemark<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_info = [[squadParams]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[squad.xml]]
</value></part></template>
